dct_description_sm: This polygon data layer represents the boundary for Illinois in 1998. The dataset was originally published by the Illinois State Geological Survey in 1998.[This is an Arc/Info polygon and arc data set showing the state line boundary of Illinois. Nominal scale is 1:62,500.]
schema_provider_s: American Geographical Society Library â€“ UWM Libraries
